ygData.subject: Great odds, worse chances...The Autobots vs. the D.E.D
ygData.msgSnippet: Crotale followed out behind Pacifix, eager to show his skill in battle. Slag roared out right beside his dino bot leader. Lets burn them to shreds Grimlock.

Subject: Great odds, worse chances...The Autobots vs. the D.E.D

Priority: normal

Crotale followed out behind Pacifix, eager to show his skill in 
battle.  

Slag roared out right beside his dino bot leader. "Lets burn them to 
shreds Grimlock. "  He said shooting a blast of fire at Tremor.  

JetV crouched behind a hill.  "Aww, my back" he said said, slowly 
taking out his rifle and shooting four blasts at Slugslinger.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tremor looked at the bots coming out of hte ship. Not thinking 
about the odds he faced began shooting.  Firing fourblast of his 
Gyroscopic destabilizer at Pacifix, Artemis, Dion, and another 
stray shot whizzing at Slugslinger.  "Die all of you , hhahaha" he 
said as he fired his plasma rifle at the Technobots, one shot at 
each.
